description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. www.snake360.com - Do you want classic gameplay with TWO 4-player Battle modes, 90 levels of action, great music from SCI Recordings, tight controls and Internet Ranking?  If so, Snake360 Lite may be for you!  Snake360 Lite contains many of Snake360's best features--including the top-notch multiplayer battles--for just 80 MSP!  Hours of fun await!
